name: Rubberband Stan
description:
The story begins in the Hudson River beneath the water's surface, New York, NY. Join our hero Stanley (a.k.a., Rubberband Stan or just "Stan") in his epic, race against the clock journey to find a man by the name of Dr. Ivan M. Witting. Why? Well, not even Stan knows but something tells him that Dr. Witting has the answer he is looking for. This is an action adventure arcade game with simple one-touch physics based grappling hook controls showcasing eye-candy polished graphics and an intriguing story line.

Features:

• A high flying, city-slinging experience. A tour through the city of New York, NY, of the United States of America, one of the largest metropolitan cities in the entire World. Help Stan travel not by foot but, rather, by hand from Manhattan to Brooklyn up, over, around and through buildings and subway trains!

• A proper execution of Bushnell’s Law: Easy to learn, difficult to master. Anyone can cover 95% of the game with ease, but conquering this game takes talent and skill developed through time and experience. Rubberband Stan takes the benefit of hyper-casual simplicity and injects a storyline and high-resolution graphics into it.

• Hidden treats. Aside from the general gameplay and visuals, there are hidden anomalies for one to stumble upon. The experienced gamer may know these obscure pleasures as “Easter Eggs.”

• Unlock Stan’s friends and alter egos. Yes, Stan has both friends and alter egos available for unlocking, all with their own attributes and some with advantageous skills.

• Unlock the coveted Zen Mode! Explore the endless New York countryside with no score, no timer, and no distractions as Standroid the rocket powered robot.

• The music and audio compliment the therapeutic gameplay and cityscape. Headphones or a quiet room are therefore recommended for the fullest experience.

By Rmac Innovations LLC - "Simply Awesome"
All Rights Reserved.
